title: Amazing Studio close to college campus! Check us out!
posting_body: ['Residences on Bedford', 'Located at: 1425 Bedford St Stamford, CT 06905', 'Featured unit: Studio bed | 1 bath | 700 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $1804 - $2000/month', 'Call Today!', '(203) 208-3262', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Providing the convenience of an apartment and the comfort of a home, Residences On Bedford in Stamford, Connecticut offers a variety of recently renovated apartment homes, many with spectacular views of Long Island Sound.', 'Shopping, entertainment and dining are conveniently located just minutes away.', 'Amenities include an elegant club room, swimming pool with nearby gas grills, free wi-fi access in common areas, garages, laundry facilities on every floor, a pool, abundant closet space, and much more.', 'Come see why Residences On Bedford is just the place for downtown living!', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '➢ Bowling Alley', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gas Grills', '➢ On-Site Park', '➢ Parks Nearby', '➢ Pet Friendly', '➢ Play Area', '➢ Pool', '➢ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '➢ Beautiful Picnic Areas', '➢ Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '➢ Elegant Clubroom', '➢ Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '➢ Ice Skating Rink **', 'Winter Only', '➢ Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '➢ Near Downtown Stamford', '➢ Online Payments Available', 'Apartment Features!', '➢ Abundant Closet Space', '➢ Black Appliances', '➢ Blinds', '➢ Garage', '➢ Heating', '➢ Large, Private Balconies', '➢ Spectacular Views in Select Units', '➢ Stainless Steel appliances in Select Units', '➢ Storage Units', '➢ Updated Interior Finishes', '(203) 208-3262', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A02AA03AF6A74617']
